song.title: Reign in Us
song.lyrics:
[1] . Em You thought of us . C Before the world began to breathe . D G You knew our names before we came to be || . Em C You saw the very day we'd fall away from You . D G And how desperately we need to be redeemed
[P] . C D Lord Jesus come lead us . Am D We're desperate for Your touch
[C] .G D Oh Great and Mighty One, with one desire we come .Am Em C D That You would reign, that You would reign in us || .G D We're offering up our lives, a living sacrifice .Am Em C D That You would reign, that You would reign in us
--- [2] .Em C Spirit of the Living God fall fresh again . D G Come search our hearts and purify our lives || . Em C We need Your perfect love, we need Your discipline . D G We're lost unless You guide us with Your light
[B1] . D C G We cry out for Your life to revive us . D C G Cry out for Your love to define us . D C G Cry out for Your mercy to keep us .Em Dsus D blameless until You return
[B2] . C G D So, reign please reign in us . C G D Come purify our hearts, we need Your touch || . C G D Come cleanse us like a flood and send us out . C G D So the world may know You reign You reign in us
